column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If you want to come here during the summer at a normal dinner time
column2: good luck having to wait less than an hour. You put your name in their system and then they text you when your table is ready. While you're waiting
column3: you can order your pizza beforehand
column4: because they take a while to make
column5: and have it come quicker to your table. So usually when you get to your table
column6: you don't have to wait too long to eat
column7: but then it makes it feel like a factory
column10: you get out. It's definitely not my favorite restaurant environment.
